actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, and Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to authorize the President to negotiate an agreement establishing a joint commission to resolve trade and other economic disputes between the United States and Canada.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to authorize the President to seek through an agreement the establishment of a joint commission to resolve trade and other economic issues between the United States and Canada.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to authorize the President to negotiate an agreement establishing a joint commission to resolve trade and other economic disputes between the United States and Canada.
